meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Marcus Lewis Christine Qualey Katie Walker Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7161.

td.p: Marcus Lewis, a tutor from Brooklyn, New York
Christine Qualey, a retired teacher from Abington, Massachusetts
Katie Walker, a biomedical science teacher from Chapel Hill, North Carolina (whose 1-day cash winnings total $5,000)

tr.td: ORDERS OF MAMMALS
DOUBLE LETTER 6-LETTER WORDS
SPORTS IN LITERATURE
MINT CONDITION
TALKING GEOGRAPHY
MAIL CALL

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law. This website is not affiliated with, sponsored by, or operated by Jeopardy Productions, Inc. Join the discussion at JBoard.tv.
